resources.string: No Notes Yet. please add notes!
Are you sure you want to delete this note?

App Info:
name:Notapad

Author Info:
name:Yu Yizhao
Roll NO:09011A0560
Branch:Computer Science & Engineering(CSE)

Guide Info:
name: Dr. B.Padmaja Rani

The aim of this project is to create an application- notepad that enables users to create new notes, edit and delete notes by using SQLite database scheme. Users can remember and record what they think and what they want to do by creating their own notes.

before 18/01/13: Notepad framework was created.
 20/01/13: background color of notes was changed into ivory.
 21/01/13: new Activity "Log" used to record this app developing logs and progeress was added.
 25/01/13: function of viewing notes is enabled.
 27/01/13: Navigation up was enabled.
 28/01/13: Developing log was created.
 29/01/13: feature of deleting notes was enable in noteview activity.
 04/02/13: style of action bar was changed.
 06/02/13: Split action bar was deployed.
 07/02/13 function of viewing notes is added!
 08/02/13 share function was added.
 10/02/13 Dialog fragment was added.
 11/02/13 toast notification was added.
 16/02/13 New data access scheme: Content Provider was used. 
 25/02/13 Responding speed increases due to multi-threading techniques.
